rules.description: Global: Change caps_lock key to command+control+option+shift. (Use shift+caps_lock as caps_lock)
Global: Change shift + delete to forward delete (rev 2)
Terminals: ‚å• + ‚Üê | Move cursor to line begin
Terminals: ‚å• + ‚Üí | Move cursor to line end
Terminals: ‚åò + ‚Üê | Move cursor one word behind
Terminals: ‚åò + ‚Üí | Move cursor one word ahead
